resources.string: HIGH QUALITY MALARIA DIAGNOSIS IN LOW RESOURCE ENVIRONMENTS
Clean both camera lens and microscope lens to remove any dirt other objects that can interfere with the detection
Place the phone into the holding kit provided and secure holding kit to microscope
Check if phone is properly attached to the microscope and make sure the battery is charged
Prepare blood smear, ensure the blood smear is thick enough and check for contamination
After placing blood smear underneath the microscope lens wait until MOMALA App gives confirmation that the image is focused
Move the blood smear when asked, STOP moving when prompted. While changing position of blood smear do not make any sudden movements
During focusing do not touch the microscope or mobile phone to yield high quality images
After focusing the application takes images automatically and shows progress to user
Wait until the results are shown and upload results to server for safekeeping
No more pictures are needed. Results will be shown in a second.
This app demonstrates the usage of CameraView. In order to do that, it needs permission to access camera.
Camera app cannot do anything without camera permission.
